body: Couldn't finish the story, the mc is a massive cunt and disguises his intentions with 'mistakes' or 'inexperience' to get what he wants. He just progressively becomes more horny and scummy as the story progresses, and unfortunately, the females were too stupid and weak to do anything despite Denise initial attempts to push him away.
This got ruined by the MC.
